signalGreen

Class TrafficLight

  • java.lang.Object
    • signalGreen.GisAgent
      • signalGreen.Junction
        • signalGreen.TrafficLight

  • public class TrafficLight
extends Junction
    TrafficLight object is a subclass of the Junction object. It has a traffic light dedicated to each lane linked to the Junction. It contains the Step() method that performs the light changing algorithm.
    Author:
    Waqar, Adeela

    • Method Detail

      • addJunction

        public void addJunction(Junction junc)
        Add traffic light for new lane to given Junction. If it is the first light, set state to GREEN, else RED.
        Overrides:
        addJunction in class Junction
        Parameters:
        junc - is the other Junction the lane will be between.
        See Also:
        Junction.addJunction(signalGreen.Junction)

      • removeLane

        public void removeLane(Junction junc,
              boolean out)
        Remove traffic light for lane to given Junction.
        Overrides:
        removeLane in class Junction
        Parameters:
        junc - is the other Junction the lane is between.
        out - is a boolean flag for the lane direction being outward.
        See Also:
        Junction.removeLane(signalGreen.Junction, boolean)
